content.rendered:
Directed by Sachin Kundalkar

Star Neelay Mehendale (Tanay). Prateik Babbar (Paying Guest). Lovish Bhatia (Young Tanay). Neil Bhoopalam (Professor). Anant Joshi (Aseem (as Anant Vijay Joshi)). Zacharia Katticaren (Hockey Coach). Geetanjali Kulkarni (Sharada). Yashwant Mundhra (Artist in Black & White Photographs). Nivya (Female Professor). Vishnu Pisharady (Tanay’s Friend). Shruti Pradeep (Fathima). Shishir Sharma (Vidyadhar). Anjali Sivaraman (Anuja). Yogesh Vyas (Pandit)

Written by Sachin Kundalkar. Satyanshu Singh. Satyanshu Singh

Language Hindi. English

Producers Yamin Andrabi. Pranayi Garg. Wasim Khan. Priya Sreedharan. Zulfaquar Haider Torabi. Anubin Vishnu

Production Netflix Studios. Open Air Films
